entities.name: centaur
entities.description: A mythical creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse. It is mentioned in the context of a story or legend.

entities.name: edgecombe
entities.description: Miss Edgecombe is a person who comes to Professor Umbridge's office with information about a secret meeting. She is described as telling Professor Umbridge that there will be a meeting in the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: A secret room on the seventh floor of a building, also known as the Room of Requirement. It is mentioned as a place where Miss Edgecombe says something will be found to Professor Umbridge's advantage.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is a person who is hiding her face and is affected by some kind of hex. She becomes distressed when she sees herself in the mirror.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who speaks to Marietta after she has become distressed. He tries to comfort her and asks her questions about the meeting.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a person who receives information from Miss Edgecombe about a secret meeting in the Room of Requirement. He also speaks to Marietta after she has become distressed.
